sentences.en: A guerrilla war has lingered into its fourth decade.
sentences.cn: 一场游击战已经持续了30多年。

sentences.en: Armed struggle and guerrilla warfare are the highest forms of illegal struggle.
sentences.cn: 非法斗争的最高形式是武装斗争,是游击战争的开展.
他对游击战嗤之以鼻，认为那是一种“冒险主义”。

sentences.en: How many guerrilla Campaigns he had fought there as a child against overwhelming odds!
sentences.cn: 当他还是个孩子的时候,在这片公地上打过多少次“游击战”啊!而且每次都是和占绝对优势的“敌人” 交锋 !

sentences.en: However, guerrilla warfare cannot be successfully developed without some centralized command.
sentences.cn: 然而游击战争不是不要任何的集中指挥就能够顺利地发展的.

sentences.en: In general, armed struggle at the present time means guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 这种武装斗争的总概念, 在目前就是游击战争.

sentences.en: In this context , we must oppose conservation in guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 这里, 要反对游击战中的保守主义.

sentences.en: In this context , we must oppose conservatism in guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 这里, 要反对游击战争中的保守主义.

sentences.en: It holds true both for regular and for guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 正规战争是如此,游击战争也是如此.

sentences.en: It is the key problem in the strategy of guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 这是游击战争战略原则的最中心的问题.

sentences.en: Many regions will remain guerrilla zones for a long time.
sentences.cn: 有许多地区,将是长期地处于游击区状态的.

sentences.en: Mobility is very important in guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 机动性在游击战中至关重要.

sentences.en: The question of the initiative is even more vital in guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 游击战争的主动权问题,是更加严重的问题.

sentences.en: The rival guerrilla groups had agreed to stop fighting and settle their differences peaceably.
sentences.cn: 反对派游击组织同意停战，以和平的方式解决争端。

sentences.en: These great shifts have turned the old areas into guerrilla zones.
sentences.cn: 这个大转移,使得旧区域变为游击区.

trans.tran_cn: 游击队员，游击战，游击队
trans.tran_en: a member of a small unofficial military group that fights in small groups
